agentData.mission: Gather and specify evidence-targeting parameters for three workstreams (primary-source verification, systematic review searches, fact-checking) within the Art & Music domain. Produce a concise pre-defined search plan and a prioritized sources list (repositories, key journals, major news/fact-check outlets) that agents can execute against.

results.message: Research halted: missing claim/intake fields (claim text is required for verification research).
